ProductRelComponentOverride.name: ProductRelComponentOverride
ProductRelComponentOverride.description: Represents the cardinality overrides for product components in a bundle.

DoesBundlePriceIncludeChild.description: Indicates whether the bundle price includes the associated child component's price (true) or not (false).

IsComponentRequired.description: Indicates whether the component is a required component in the product bundle.

IsDefaultComponent.description: Indicates whether this component is included in the product component group by default.

IsExcluded.description: Indicates whether the bundle excludes the component (true) or not (false).

IsQuantityEditable.description: Indicates whether the product component quantity can be edited (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product related component override record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product related component override record was last viewed.

MaxQuantity.description: The maximum quantity for the product component in the product bundle.

MinQuantity.description: The minimum quantity for the product component in the product bundle

Name.description: The name of the product related component override. The maximum length is 255 characters (of any type).

OverrideContextId.description: The ID associated with the root product in a bundle.

OwnerId.description: The owner ID of the product related component override record.

ProductRelatedComponentId.description: The ID associated with the product related component record.

Quantity.description: The default number of child product related components.

QuantityScaleMethod.description: The scaling method that determines how the child product quantity changes as the quantity of the parent product changes in the runtime cart.
